question: one of the sign of qiyamat (End of times) will be the death of a king whose name means an animal; knowing that 'fahd' means leopard
answer:
QUESTION
You certainly know King Fahd passed away today, Innanillahi wa Innanillahi rajioun. I read somewhere that one of the sign of qiyamat (End of times) will be the death of a king whose name means an animal; knowing that 'fahd' means leopard in english. Could please tell me whether there is any authentic hadith confirming this event? Djazakallah for your answer.
ANSWER


Share:

We were unable to locate such a Hadith.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
